revision.text:
{{Documentation subpage}} The templates in this series are designed to be used in a [[Help:Table|table]] to make a cell with text in that cell, with an appropriately colored background. They are commonly used in [[:Category:Comparisons|comparison tables]]. For example, {{Tl|yes}} makes a cell with a green background. The text in the cell is taken from the [[Help:Template#Parameters|first parameter]]; {{yes|Sure}} would output "Sure" otherwise it defaults to "Yes". Most templates allow authors to override the default text in this way, some require text put after the template call and some also need a vertical bar in between: {{''table cell template''}} ''text'' or {{''table cell template''}} | ''text''. This information, the colors and default texts are found in the table below. If you want to use other attributes for the table cells, e.g. colspan or rowspan, they need to be put before the template call and there must be no vertical bar | in between them: {| class=wikitable align=right !{{Yes}} ||{{No}} ||rowspan=2 {{n/a}} |- |colspan=2 {{Yes-No}} |} 
...
!{{Yes}} ||{{No}} ||rowspan=2 {{n/a}}
|-
|colspan=2 {{Yes-No}}
...
=== Templates in this series === {| class="wikitable" |+ Table cell templates ! ClassThe HTML class of table cell templates may be referenced in a [[m:help:User style|user stylesheet]] to change appearance. !! Template !! Preview !! Preview, alternative |- |rowspan=2| table-rh || {{Tl|rh}} | Row header || {{rh}} | Row header || |- | {{Tl|rh2}}Does not take a parameter; the content should be placed after the template call, separated by a pipe (|) character. | Row header || {{rh2}} | Row header || |- | table-yes || {{Tl|yes}}, {{Tlp|yes|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} || {{yes}} ||{{yes|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} |- |rowspan=3| table-no || {{Tl|no}}, {{Tlp|no|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} || {{no}} ||{{no|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} |- | {{Tl|coming soon}} || {{coming soon}} || |- | {{Tl|bad}}, {{Tlp|bad|F}} || {{bad}} || {{bad|F}} |- | table-siteactive || {{Tl|Site active}} || {{site active}} || |- | table-siteinactive || {{Tl|Site inactive}} || {{site inactive}} || |- |rowspan=7| table-yes2 || {{Tl|yes2}} Text || {{yes2}}Text || |- | {{Tl|won}}, {{Tlp|won|5}} || {{won}} || {{won|5}} |- | {{won|place=1}} or =Gold || {{won|place=1}} || |- | {{won|place=2}} or =Silver || {{won|place=2}} || |- | {{won|place=3}} or =Bronze || {{won|place=3}} || |- | {{won|text=white|color=blue}} or =#1122CC || {{won|text=white|color=blue}} || |- | {{Tl|good}}, {{Tlp|good|A}} || {{good}} || {{good|A}} |- |rowspan=3| table-no2 || {{Tl|no2}}Does not take a parameter; the content should be placed after the template call. Text || {{no2}} Text || |- | {{Tl|nom}}, {{Tlp|nom|5}} || {{nom}} || {{nom|5}} |- | {{Tl|sho}} || {{sho}} || |- |rowspan=4| table-partial || {{Tl|partial}} || {{partial}} || |- | {{Tl|yes-No}} || {{Yes-No}} || |- | {{Tl|okay}}, {{Tlp|okay|C}} || {{okay}} || {{okay|C}} |- | {{Tl|some}} || {{some}} || |- | table-any || {{Tl|any}} || {{any}} || |- |rowspan=2| table-na || {{Tl|n/a}} || {{n/a}} || |- | {{Tl|BLACK}} || {{BLACK}} || |- |rowspan=2| table-unknown || {{Tl|dunno}} || {{dunno}} || |- | {{Tl|Unknown}} || {{Unknown}} || |- | table-depends || {{Tl|Depends}}, {{Tlp|Depends|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} || {{Depends}}|| {{Depends|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} |- | table-included || {{Tl|Included}} || {{Included}} || |- |rowspan=2| table-dropped || {{Tl|dropped}} || {{dropped}} || |- | {{Tl|terminated}} || {{terminated}} || |- |rowspan=2| table-beta || {{Tl|beta}} || {{beta}} || |- | {{Tl|table-experimental}}, {{Tlp|table-experimental|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} || {{table-experimental}}||{{table-experimental|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} |- | table-free || {{Tl|free}}, {{Tlp|free|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} || {{free}} ||{{free|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} |- | table-nonfree || {{Tl|nonfree}}, {{Tlp|nonfree|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} || {{nonfree}}|| {{nonfree|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} |- | table-proprietary || {{Tl|proprietary}}, {{Tlp|proprietary|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} ||{{proprietary}} || {{proprietary|Alternate [[Plain text|text]]}} |- | table-needs || {{Tl|needs}}, {{Tlp|needs|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} || {{needs}} ||{{needs|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} |- | ''no class'' || {{Tl|incorrect}}, {{Tlp|incorrect|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} || {{incorrect}} ||{{incorrect|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} |- | ''no class'' || {{Tl|no result}}, {{Tlp|no result|N.R.}} || {{No result}} || {{No result|N.R.}} |- | ''no class'' || {{Tl|pending}} || {{Pending}} || |- | table-nightly || {{Tl|nightly}}, {{Tlp|nightly|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} || {{nightly}}|| {{nightly|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} |- | table-release-candidate || {{Tl|release-candidate}}, {{Tlp|release-candidate|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} || {{release-candidate}}|| {{release-candidate|Alternative [[Plain text|text]]}} |- | ''no class'' || {{Tl|?}}Does not take a parameter; not really a table cell template at all, but here for completeness || {{?}} || |- | ''no class'' || {{Tl|unofficial}} || {{Unofficial}} || |- | ''no class'' || {{Tl|usually}} || {{Usually}} || |- | ''no class'' || {{Tl|rarely}} || {{Rarely}} || |} === Code === Common code to most if not all the templates in this series: :{{Table cell templates|class=''automatic''|text=''text''|bg=#''abcdef''}} Code specific to this template: :{{ {{BASEPAGENAME}} }} To make a new table cell template you can use: {{subst:Table cell templates| text = default text | bg = background color | class = a class name without prefix | align = standard horizontal alignment}} You should leave out the align parameter and often the class parameter is unnecessary, too. Add the new template to the table in the [[Template:Table cell templates/doc|common documentation]] afterwards. Please consider reusing one of the other templates and please choose the color sensibly. If you find a table cell template that does not take a parameter and you want to be able to change the text in the cell, ''do not'' duplicate the template! Instead, edit the template and change the text to a default parameter substitution. For example, if a template's text is Dropped, change that to {{{1|Dropped}}}. === See also === * {{Tl|multiplayer}} * {{Tl|GPL-lic}} * {{Tl|chg}}: calculate and display changes between two values === Notes === {{Reflist}} [[Category:Table cell templates]] [[es:Plantilla:Celda de tabla de plantillas]] [[ca:Plantilla:Plantilles per les cel·les de les taules]] [[eo:Ŝablono:Jes ne]] [[hsb:Předłoha:Haj ně]] [[ja:Template:Table cell templates]] [[ko:틀:표 셀 틀]] [[ru:Шаблон:Победа]] [[sh:Šablon:Da-ne]] [[tr:Şablon:Adaylık]] [[zh:Template:Table cell templates]]
